# Web Portal

Dynamic Web Portal for the SACN (Spanish acronym for Alimentary Security and Nutritional Culture) Department on [Territorial Polytechnic University of Paria "Luis Mariano Rivera"](https://uptparia.edu.ve/).

This allows the Department upload News and Importants Documents for the SACN students.

![Badge Terminado](https://img.shields.io/badge/Status-FINISHED-blue)

## ðŸ“² Installation

Use a PHP interpreter like [XAMPP](https://www.apachefriends.org/):

1. Open XAMPP.
2. Start Apache.
3. Start MySQL.
4. Open [PHPMyAdmin](localhost/phpmyadmin/).
5. Create a new user: `user: root`; `password: starlight.21`.
6. Import the `portalweb_sacn (1).sql` file from `db` directory on PHPMyAdmin.
7. Move the repository to the `htdocs` directory created on the XAMPP directory (Common path: C:/xampp/htdocs/)
8. Open [localhost/PortalWeb/](localhost/PortalWeb) on web.

High level user: `user: gabigabs123`; `password: gabPowered`.
